Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Akukho mntu uza kungena kuwo ngaphandle kosisingcoli (owala ukukholwa kwi-Islam)
Ke bona abamoyikayo uAllâh, baya kususwa babe kude kuwo (uMlilo)
Lowo	uchitha	ubutyebi	bakhe	ekuzongezeleleni ukuhlambuluka komphefumlo wakhe
Ngaphandle	kokufuna	ukukholisa	iNkosi	yakhe Ephakamileyo, (uAllâh)
Inene uBomi oBuzayo bobona bulungileyo kunobu (bomi balo mhlaba)
Yaye inene iNkosi yakho Iya kukunika (konke okulungileyo) ukuze wena waneliseke
Inene kubo bonke ubunzima kukho ukukhululeka
Kanti, inene kubo bonke ubunzima kukho ukukhululeka
Ngoko ke wakugqiba (imisebenzi yakho yosuku) zinikele kunqulo luka-Allâh
Yaye beka iingcinga zakho zonke eNkosini yakho
